title: The right oil for my 1954 Chevrolet pickup.
description: If you have a classic vehicle with a flat tappet lifter 6 cylinder, this the oil to use.  The ZDDP is the key.  Flat tappet lifter engines need the ZDDP, zinc additive to prevent excessive wear to the camshaft. My pickup is still going strong after 70,000 miles, religiously changing the oil every 3,000 miles. My pickup runs just as good now as when I first fired it up after rebuilding the engine. I won't use anything else.
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023

title: Stands up to heat and high RPMs
description: I bought this oil for my mowers and portable generators. It is designed for high heat and high RPMs under heavy loads. I have used it for years and it stands up to tough workload these air-cooled engines have to do.
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023

title: Great for older engines.
description: This is great oil for older flat tappet engines. Read a lot about this hurting catalytic converters, but if your engine doesn't burn oil you don't have any worries! Use this in my 1997 Jeep Cherokee and my 2000 Dodge 3500 Ram van.
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 6, 2023

title: Hands down, best oil for air cooled VWs
description:
I own 3 classic VW beetles, And for years I've tried to match the best oil for these engines. Tried everything, from dyno oils, synthetic blends to boutique full grade synthetics. I was never satisfied until I found. Valvoline VR1 full synthetic high sync. CAUTION: Do not get confused with the silver and blue bottle labeled as VR1 Racing. It's not syntheti, get the black bottle.
The high zinc content is perfect for these and older engines with flat tapped cams. Add a can of Liquimoly Mos2, And your engine will absolutely love it. Easy vold starts, top protectoon during extreme heat, and a smooth running engine until the next oil change at 3K miles. Follow this simple rule And you will have an engine for life.
date: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2023

title: Cheap
description: Couldn't ask for a better price for this oil. By the case. Reasonable.
date: Reviewed in the United States on August 14, 2023

title: Great Dino oil
description:
After tons of research and a long journey down the rabbi hole of oil. I stumbled on this high zinc racing oil for air cooled motors specifically.
So, far so good on my 98 road king classic. Those evos weren't made for synthetic and I'm sold on the mineral oil from valvoline.....cheap and seems to get the job done
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 21, 2023

title: Good product, good price
description:
Quality oil. Delivered undamaged!!
Good price.
Ordered from wallimart and all grease tubes were literally crushed and oil was leaking out of box. Many leaking quarts of synthetic oil!
It was clear that the damage happened at the distribution center but these days quality control has been awful amongst SOME companies.
TO SUM UPâ€¦Stay with companies like this. The quality control and packaging is great.
date: Reviewed in the United States on July 16, 2023
